content: Create TargetType enum and BevyTarget struct in cargo_detector.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after creating new types
Update CargoDetector to add find_bevy_targets() and extract_all_targets() methods
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating CargoDetector
Add find_all_targets_by_name() function in scanning.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding find_all_targets_by_name
Add find_required_target_with_path() function with enhanced path error messages in scanning.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding find_required_target_with_path
Run clippy check after completing core unified types and functions
Fix any clippy issues following dead code removal rules
Update find_required_app_with_path() to delegate to find_required_target_with_path()
Update find_required_example_with_path() to delegate to find_required_target_with_path()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating public API functions
Update find_all_apps_by_name() to use find_all_targets_by_name() with App filter
Update find_all_examples_by_name() to use find_all_targets_by_name() with Example filter
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating find_all functions
Update brp_launch_bevy_app.rs to use BevyTarget instead of BinaryInfo
Update brp_launch_bevy_example.rs to use BevyTarget instead of ExampleInfo
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating launch files
Update any remaining files that reference BinaryInfo or ExampleInfo
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating remaining references
Remove old BinaryInfo and ExampleInfo types from cargo_detector.rs
Remove old find_bevy_apps() and find_bevy_examples() methods from CargoDetector
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing old types and methods
Run final clippy check
Fix any remaining clippy issues following dead code removal rules
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
STOP and task new subagent for code review focusing on duplication, complexity, and plan validation
STOP and review suggested changes with user after code review
